md:
giải nghĩa từ "improves" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Verb: improves (third person singular present of improve)
	* Meaning: Cải thiện, nâng cao
	* Example sentence: The new policy improves the company's productivity.
	* Related words: improvement, improved, improving

2. Verb: improves (third person singular present of improve)
	* Meaning: Làm cho tốt hơn
	* Example sentence: The exercise improves her flexibility.
	* Related words: improvement, improved, improving

3. Verb: improves (third person singular present of improve)
	* Meaning: Tăng cường
	* Example sentence: The new technology improves the accuracy of the results.
	* Related words: improvement, improved, improving
html:
giải nghĩa từ "improves" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Verb: improves (third person singular present of improve)

    • Meaning: Cải thiện, nâng cao
    • Example sentence: The new policy improves the company's productivity.
    • Related words: improvement, improved, improving

  2. Verb: improves (third person singular present of improve)

    • Meaning: Làm cho tốt hơn
    • Example sentence: The exercise improves her flexibility.
    • Related words: improvement, improved, improving

  3. Verb: improves (third person singular present of improve)

    • Meaning: Tăng cường
    • Example sentence: The new technology improves the accuracy of the results.
    • Related words: improvement, improved, improving
